turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order four pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds delicious. what sizes did you want for those 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All larger and I need all of them with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what did you want on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, the first one I would like light tomato sausage, cheese extra cheese, pepperoni and sausage, one I would like chicken barbecue with onions and bell peppers, the third one I need extra sauce, pepperoni, sausage, bacon and Canadian bacon and the fourth one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All I need is extra cheese, onions, bell peppers, and olives, and that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for the third pizza, did you want both canadian bacon and bacon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'm sorry. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. i'll add that in. so the order is for 4 large pizzas, all with gluten free crust, 1 with light tomato sauce, extra cheese, pepperoni, and sausage, 1 with bbq chicken with onions and bell peppers, 1 with extra sauce pepperoni, sausage, regular bacon and canadian bacon, and 1 with extra cheese, onions, bell peppers and olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $65.98 is the total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order, it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy.
